text: See also: 1892 in organized crime, other events of 1893, 1894 in organized crime and the list of 'years in Organized Crime'. ==Events== ==Arts and literature== *If Christ Came To Chicago (non-fiction book) by William Thomas Stead ==Births== *Fred "Trigger" Burke, Egan's Rats member and freelance hitman *John C. Montana, Magaddino crime family member *Frank Scalise, Anastasia crime family underboss *Frankie Yale [Francesco Uale], Brooklyn Prohibition gangster ==Deaths== Organized crime Category:Years in organized crime
title: 1893 in organized crime
